items.sentence: I think Tom might\'ve taken something he shouldn\'t have.
Tom always writes everything down, so he doesn\'t forget.
We\'re finding it difficult deciding on which one to buy.
We\'ve been out of touch with each other for a long time.
What makes you think I\'m going to go to Boston with Tom?
What\'s the weirdest thing that has ever happened to you?
Tom asked the janitor to open the door to the auditorium.
Tom bent down and pretended to be tying one of his shoes.
Tom bought a piece of land not far from where Mary lives.
Tom came out on the stage and started playing his guitar.
